title: Permission Management
tooltip: Configure user/group access permissions in clusters

admin.name: Admin
admin.description: Read/write access to all resources in all namespaces (must select all namespaces).

ops.name: Operations
ops.description: Read/write access to most resources in all namespaces (must select all namespaces).

dev.name: Developer
dev.description: Read/write access to most resources in selected namespaces (can select partial namespaces).

readonly.name: Read-only
readonly.description: Read-only access to most resources in selected namespaces (can select partial namespaces).

custom.name: Custom
custom.description: Permissions are determined by the ClusterRole or Role you select.

actions.confirmDeletePermission: Are you sure you want to delete this permission?
actions.confirmBatchDelete: Are you sure you want to batch delete selected permissions?

form.customRolePlaceholder: e.g. view, edit, cluster-admin or custom role name
form.allNamespacesRequired: This permission type requires all namespaces
form.namespacePlaceholder: Enter namespace name (supports wildcards, e.g. app-*)

sync.title: Sync KubePolaris Permission Resources
sync.description: Sync will create RBAC resources (ClusterRole, ServiceAccount, ClusterRoleBinding) required by KubePolaris in the target cluster to support different permission types for kubectl terminal access.
